To Clarify: 
This matter is of a personal nature. 

To the fans of the Hack=
, We have just begun! 

-Sum 

----- Original Message ----- 

  From: Lisby=
 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, December 02, 2007 8:40 AM
=
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: cease-and-desist notice from Radio Shack???


=
  This is exactly what I expect is happening. Sum said the site would be do=
wn "in the near term," which made me think he making modifications to be su=
re that the corporation cannot bother him again.



  Ann


  On Dec 2, 200=
7, at 9:55 AM, M.A. Coletta (Mike) wrote:


    If it is in fact a cease-an=
d-desist notice from Radio Shack, it 
    wouldn't be the first time they (=
RS) have done this. I receieved a 
    cease-and-desist notice from Radio S=
hack many years ago when I was 
    modifying their radio scanner products =
and posting them on the web. 
    Guess what... if you go to scanshack.com =
you can still see step-by-
    step instructions on how I modified their sc=
anners, with detailed 
    drawings I did.
    They (RS/Tandy at that time)=
 lost that battle with me, or I should 
    say their lawyer lost that batt=
le with me.
    But, as you said... we shall wait and see what is up with t=
his issue.
    - Mike

    --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Lisby <lisby@...=
> wrote:
    >
    > Judy, and everyone else, too--please don't promote or =
continue 
    this 
    > until we hear from Sum. This may not be what ever=
yone is assuming 
    at 
    > all. My concern is that he has received a c=
ease-and-desist notice 
    > from Radio Shack, which may have been informe=
d that someone was 
    > promoting their product in a way not in complimen=
t with their 
    > corporate image, and that his counsel is advising he co=
mply with 
    it. 
    > What you are telling people to do may be exactly =
what his own 
    legal 
    > counsel is advising against and may put him =
in a precarious 
    situation.
    > 
    > Please just calm down and don'=
t make assumption until he can 
    clarify 
    > for us. If it comes down=
 to someone making personal threats 
    against 
    > him, that's a whole=
 other matter. But he needs to ask for help 
    before 
    > everyone goe=
s all posse, OK?
    > 
    > 
    > 
    > Ann
    > 
    > 
    > On Dec =
1, 2007, at 11:53 PM, judy_in_hollywood wrote:
    > 
    > > Hi all, I sen=
t George an email about our group here (to look in) 
    + 
    > > about t=
he RS 12-469 AM/FM digital radio modification - for his 
    > > awareness!=
 Hope he gets it & READS it. =3DJudy=3D P.S. On Friday's 
    > > anyone ca=
n call in (IF ya can get thru) to his show and discuse 
    > > anything, e=
ven the RS Hack! IDEA? Let everyone out there know 
    about 
    > > it =
=3D free advertising! LOL FRANK, call in!!!
    > >
    > >
    > >
    >

=
